queries.query_name: Apt Get Install Pin Version Not Defined
queries.description: When installing a package, its pin version should be defined

files.search_key: FROM={{${MOLECULE_IMAGE}}}.RUN={{apt-get update &&     apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends     python3     python3-pip     python3-apt     sudo     systemd     systemd-sysv     ca-certificates     && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*}}
files.actual_value: Package 'sudo' does not have version defined

files.search_key: FROM={{${MOLECULE_IMAGE}}}.RUN={{apt-get update &&     apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends     python3     python3-pip     python3-apt     sudo     systemd     systemd-sysv     ca-certificates     && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*}}
files.actual_value: Package 'systemd-sysv' does not have version defined

files.search_key: FROM={{${MOLECULE_IMAGE}}}.RUN={{apt-get update &&     apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends     python3     python3-pip     python3-apt     sudo     systemd     systemd-sysv     ca-certificates     && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*}}
files.actual_value: Package 'python3' does not have version defined

files.actual_value: Package 'systemd' does not have version defined

files.search_key: FROM={{${MOLECULE_IMAGE}}}.RUN={{apt-get update &&     apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends     python3     python3-pip     python3-apt     sudo     systemd     systemd-sysv     ca-certificates     && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*}}
files.actual_value: Package 'ca-certificates' does not have version defined

files.search_key: FROM={{${MOLECULE_IMAGE}}}.RUN={{apt-get update &&     apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends     python3     python3-pip     python3-apt     sudo     systemd     systemd-sysv     ca-certificates     && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*}}

queries.description: Some modules could end up creating new files on disk with permissions that might be too open or unpredictable

files.expected_value: All the permissions set in ansible.builtin.copy about creating files/directories
files.actual_value: There are some permissions missing in ansible.builtin.copy and might create directory/file
